title: Psychotherapy
desc: We offer individual therapy, couples counseling, family therapy, and psychiatric consultations, both in-person and online—tailored to your unique needs.

title: Psychiatric Support
desc: We offer individual therapy, couples counseling, family therapy, and psychiatric consultations, both in-person and online—tailored to your unique needs.

title: Single Session Therapy (SST)
desc: A first in Bangladesh! Our innovative Single Session Therapy (SST) is designed for those seeking immediate, focused, and solution-driven support in just one session. It’s flexible, accessible, and an effective way to address pressing concerns without long-term commitment.

title: Support Groups for Shared Healing
desc: We host both peer-led and expert-led support groups, fostering connection, validation, and collective growth for individuals facing similar challenges.

title: Mental Health Training & Capacity Building
desc: Our training programs equip professionals, caregivers, and individuals with essential mental health skills, empowering them to support themselves and others effectively.
